sentence: +3 View gallery Jade Fitzpatrick, 26, was spotted hugging and kissing the teenage boy a hearing was told +3 View gallery The pair allegedly sparked a relationship together - and booked to go on a 200-mile trip from the home to Thorpe Park Fitzgerald, who worked in the Wrexham care home where the teenager was a resident, claimed that the other person was 'someone from the university'.
author: Dan Sales For Mailonline
title: Care worker hid recording device under bed to catch his fiancee, 26, having sex with 17-year-old in her care, hearing is told

sentence: +2 View gallery Jade Fitzpatrick (pictured), 26, was spotted hugging and kissing a teenage boy who was a resident at a children's home where she worked, a hearing was told A neighbour told a member of staff that he had seen Fitzpatrick and the youth kissing and hugging several times - leading to her suspension.
author: Laurence Dollimore For Mailonline
title: Children's home carer, 26, is facing the sack after she had 'sexual relationship' with boy, 17, wore 'inappropriate' hot pants to work and sent him text messages saying 'I love you'
